hero.title: Gufasha Abagore Binyuze mu
hero.description1: EmpowerHerEd si ahantu ho kwiga gusa, ni inzira yo gufasha, kwigisha, no gufasha abakobwa bato mu Rwanda. Intego yacu ni ukugabanya ikibazo cy'uburinganire mu tekinoroji binyuze mu guha abagore ubumenyi, ibikoresho, n'umwete bakeneye kugirango bafate umwanya mu isi ya digital.
hero.description2: Jya mu muryango wa mbere wa amashuri ya digital mu Rwanda. Wige kuva ku bafite ubumenyi mu nganda, huzwa n'abayoboramikorere, no gutangiza umwuga wawe wa tekinoroji. Niba utangira gusa cyangwa ushaka kongera ubumenyi bwawe, turi hano kugirango dukuyobore.

featuredCourses.title: Amasomo Y'ingenzi
featuredCourses.subtitle: Tangiza Urugendo Rwawe Uyu Munsi
featuredCourses.description: Hitamo mu masomo yacu yateguwe neza kugirango wihuse umwuga wawe wa tekinoroji

computerBasics.description: Menya ubumenyi bw'ibanze bwa computer hardware n'ubukorikori

internetSkills.description: Menya uko ugendera kuri interineti no kuvugana na email

microsoftWord.description: Menya uko ukoresha Microsoft Word mu madokumenti ya professional

items.description: Fata inama kuva ku bafite ubumenyi mu nganda za tekinoroji

items.description: Wige binyuze mu proje z'ingenzi n'ibikoresho by'ingenzi

mentorship.title: Porogaramu ya Mentorship
mentorship.description: Huzwa n'abayoboramikorere bafite ubumenyi bazo kuyobora mu rugendo rwawe rwa professional

leadership.title: Ubuyobozi & Kuvugana
leadership.description: Fata ubumenyi bw'ingenzi mu buyobozi no kuvugana

tech.title: Ubumenyi bwa Tekinoroji
tech.description: Menya ubumenyi bw'ingenzi bwa tekinoroji bakenewe mu kinyejana cya digital

stories.name: Marie Uwase
stories.quote: Kubera EmpowHerEd, nize ubumenyi bw`ibanze ku mashini no gutumanaho byanyeretse uko nshobora kubona akazi nka data entry clerk. Ubu nshobora gucunga inyandiko za digital no kuvugana neza n`itsinda ryanjye.
stories.achievement: Yabonye akazi ka data entry clerk kubera ubumenyi bwo gukoresha mudasobwa no gutumanaho.

stories.name: Grace Mukamana
stories.quote: EmpowHerEd yampaye ubumenyi bwo gutangiza ubucuruzi bwo kuri internet. Kwiga uko twoherereza emails z`umwuga no gukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga byamfashije kugera ku bakiriya no kuzamura ubucuruzi.
stories.achievement: Natangije kandi azamura ubucuruzi bwo kuri internet akoresheje ubumenyi bwo gutumanaho no gukoresha mudasobwa.

stories.name: Sarah Mutoni
stories.quote: Mbere ya EmpowHerEd, nagorwaga no gufasha abana banjye mu masomo no kuvugana n`abarimu. Ubu nshobora kwinjira mu nama zo kuri internet no kohereza emails byoroshye.
stories.achievement: Nateje imbere uburyo bwo gukurikirana amashuri y`abana banjye no kuvugana n`abarimu hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga.

stories.name: Claire Uwimana
stories.quote: Nyuma yo kurangiza amahugurwa ya EmpowHerEd, nahise nshyirwa mu kazi ka administrative assistant. Nize gutegura gahunda, gukora inyandiko, no gutumanaho neza ukoresheje ibikoresho bya digital.
stories.achievement: Nungutse akazi ka administrative assistant kubera ubumenyi bwatejwe imbere.

stories.name: Joyce Mukeshimana
stories.quote: Kubera amahugurwa ya EmpowHerEd, nabashije kuba umuyobozi w`abakorerabushake mu muryango. Ubu ntinya kuvugana n`abayobozi no gutegura ibikorwa bifitiye akamaro abaturage.
stories.achievement: Nabaye umuyobozi w`abakorerabushake ashingiye ku bumenyi bwo gutumanaho mu buryo bw`umwuga.

stories.name: Esther Nyiraneza
stories.quote: Ntabwo nari nzi ko nshobora gukora mu byo gufasha abantu mu by`ikoranabuhanga. Kubera EmpowHerEd, nize gutunganya ibibazo bya mudasobwa no gutumanaho, ubu mfasha bagenzi banjye gukemura ibibazo bya tekinike.
stories.achievement: Natangiye gukora mu gice cya IT support akoresheje ubumenyi bw`ibanze.

stories.name: Alice Uwamahoro
stories.quote: EmpowHerEd yampaye uburyo bwo gukora CV no kwitoza ibiganiro by`akazi. Kubera aya mahugurwa, nabonye akazi kanjye ka mbere mu bijyanye na customer service, kandi nakuze icyizere.
stories.achievement: Nabonye akazi ka mbere mu bucuruzi bwo kwakira abakiriya kubera ubumenyi bwiza bwo gutumanaho.

stories.name: Beatrice Mutoni
stories.quote: Kubera ubumenyi nabonye muri EmpowHerEd, narangije amasomo yo ku murongo ku bijyanye na digital marketing. Ibi byanteye amahirwe mashya mu kazi no kugura inshuti nshya mu kazi.
stories.achievement: Narangije amasomo ya digital marketing, bituma agira amahirwe mashya mu kazi.

stories.name: Diane Uwase
stories.quote: EmpowHerEd yanyeretse uko nakoresha spreadsheets gucunga amafaranga y`umuryango wanjye no kuvugana neza n`amabanki n`abatanga serivisi.
stories.achievement: Nateje imbere imicungire y`imari y`umuryango no kuvugana neza n`ibigo.

cta.title: Tangiza Urugendo Rwawe
cta.description: Jya mu muryango wacu utangize urugendo rwawe rwa tekinoroji uyu munsi

hero.title: Ibyerekeye
hero.description: Gufasha abagore binyuze mu ikoranabuhanga, amashuri, no gufasha umuryango.

story.title: Inkuru Yacu
story.description1: EmpowerHerEd yavutse mu mutwe mugufi ariko ufite imbaraga: iyo abagore bafite amashuri kandi bafite imbaraga, umuryango wose urakura. Yashinzwe n'itsinda ry'abarezi, abayoborabugenewe, n'abafasha, EmpowerHerEd ikora kugirango irusheho kugabanya ikibazo cy'uburinganire mu mashuri no mu mahirwe.
story.description2: Urupapuro rwacu ni ahantu hizewe, huzuye abantu bose aho abagore n'abakobwa bashobora kwiga, guhuza, no gukura mu mashuri, mu kazi, no mu buzima bwabo.

whatWeDo.title: Ibyo Dukora
whatWeDo.description: Dutanga ibirimo by'amashuri, gahunda z'ubuyobozi, amasomo, no gufasha umwuga kugirango dufasha abagore kuri buri kazi. Kuva ku banyeshuri ba sekondari kugeza ku bakozi, turi hano kugirango dukore, dutange, no gufasha.

mission.title: Intego Yacu
mission.description: Kugabanya ikibazo cy'uburinganire mu ikoranabuhanga binyuze mu gutanga abagore ubumenyi, ibikoresho, no gufasha bakeneye kugirango bafate umwanya mu kazi.

vision.title: Icyerekezo Cyacu
vision.description: Isi aho abagore bafite umwanya ungana mu ikoranabuhanga kandi bafite amahirwe yo gukora imikino myiza.

whyItMatters.title: Kuki Bikenewe
whyItMatters.description: Nubwo hari iterambere, miliyoni z'abagore mu isi ziharira amahirwe yo kwiga no kuyobora. EmpowerHerEd irimo guhindura ibyo binyuze mu gufasha kwizera, ubushobozi, no umuryango.
whyItMatters.highlight: Hamwe, dukora ejo hazaza aho amashuri ari uburenganzira kandi si ubwishingizi ku bagore bose.

values.title: Indangamuco Zacu
values.subtitle: Aya maherezo yacu atuyobora mu byose dukora kuri EmpowerHerEd

empowerment.title: Gufasha
empowerment.description: Dizera ko gufasha abagore binyuze mu mashuri no mu bumenyi.

community.title: Umuryango

hero.description: Fata ibikoresho byuzuye byo kwiga kugirango uterambe imbere mu karire kawe ka tekinoroji

courses.title: Amasomo Y'ingenzi
courses.description: Amasomo yateguwe neza yo gufasha kwiga ubumenyi bw'ingenzi bwa computer

additionalResources.title: Ibikoresho Byo Kwongera

career.title: Ibikoresho by'Umwuga

cta.title: Witeguye Gutangiza Kwiga?
